title: LEGO.Ninjago.S03E04.The.Curse.of.the.Golden.Master.WEB-DL.XviD
description:
LEGO Ninjago: Masters of Spinjitzu - Season 3 - Episode 4 (WEB-DL - XviD)
-------------------------------------------------------------------------

Victory in the Final Battle between the Gold Ninja and the Overlord has ushered
in a new era of peace and begun a technological renaissance. Time has passed and
the Ninja have become obsolete in this new hi-tech world. Just when they think all
is safe in Ninjago, they're called back into action when the reclusive inventor
Cyrus Borg warns them the Overlord has survived as a digital virus and is trapped
within the Digiverse. The Ninja will learn the Overlord seeks to steal Lloyd's
golden power to enable him to escape his digital prison and reign as the great
prophesized destructor, "The Golden Master". And to aid his villainous plot,
he's created a new technological menace more powerful than any foe the Ninja
have ever faced - Nindroids.

Produced by Wil Film and The LEGO Group.


The Stranger and the hard drive with the Digital Overlord are still missing.
The ninjas' search for them brings them deep underground where they are
assisted by an old enemy. But the Stranger and his Nindroids are getting
ever closer to capturing Lloyd.
